name: upload-to-s3
description: Form to upload files to server and aws s3 bucket

scripts.build: concurrently -p "[{name}]" -n "BE,FE" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "cd backend && npm run build" "cd frontend && npm run build"
scripts.dev: concurrently -p "[{name}]" -n "BE,FE" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run start"
scripts.lint: concurrently -p "[{name}]" -n "BE,FE" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "cd backend && npm run eslint" "cd frontend && npm run eslint"
scripts.postinstall: concurrently "cd backend && npm install" "cd frontend && npm install"
